ComicInfo.Title: Into Glory
ComicInfo.Summary:
INTO GLORY: For years, the Child of Darkness prophecy has been hanging over Robyn's head. Now, as the devastating truth about her destiny is revealed, will Robyn stand victorious or allow the Cabal to continue their reign of terror? As the hooded archer questions her role in the upcoming conflict for the fate of New York, Marian and Avella come to terms with their long-running conflict... but can Avella leave her old ways behind, or will her past catch up to her?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Manuel Preitano | 2 | C | Cover C | Roberta Ingranata & Vinicius Andrade | 3 | D | London Super Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Elias Chatzoudis | 4 | E | London Super Con Exclusive Variant Cover Limited to 100 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | F | Secret Retailer | Jason Cardy | Missing |
